colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES RJE BTZUN SGROL MA LA BRTEN NAS BU'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYA TSUL RIN CHEN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,DZA HA CHEN GUNG THOG THU BA THUS DNGUL MAndAL LA BTAGS DANG BCAS PAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,BU 'DOD PAS NI BU THOB GYUR @009A *, ,ZHING ZHES PA'I GZHUNG YOD PA'I PHYIR, ,^AIL KVOGS SANG HO THOG THU MER GEN PAndITAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AER KHE NOM CHE THO YON GU SHRI SLOB DPON BLO BZANG RGYAL MCHOG PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: AIL KVOGS SANG HO THOG THU MER GEN PAndITA,
